title: How to learn javascript
content: Have a Next.js blog with only 2 routes: / and /posts/:slug. When I'm on /posts/my-post-title, and I click on the back link (to /), all is fine. The page loads fast (no refresh). When I'm on /, and I click on /posts/my-post-title, the page refreshes and I can't figure out why. Any suggestion? Links: blog, sources
author: Someone
